## Schedule (Spring 2019)

```{r schedule}
library(kableExtra)
schedule <- data.frame(Week = seq(1:15),
                       Lecture = NA,
                       Lab = NA)

schedule %>%
  kable("html") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"), full_width = TRUE)

```
